plot: Genghis Khan, risen from outcast to ruler has united battling tribes, but faces troubles. Emissaries are tortured and killed. Trade route efforts are violently rebuffed. The Mongolian army is stretched to the furthest corners of Khan's realm, and destruction looms.
characters: Genghis Khan, Börte Üjin, Khasar, Kachiun, Temüge, Hoelun, Subutai, Jelme, Jebe, Ögedei Khan, Chagatai Khan, Yao Shu, Sorghaghtani Beki
setting: Songdo (Kaesong) Otrar Kaifeng Samarkand Panjshir Peshawar Herat
